results.title: Association Between Statin Exposure and Incidence and Prognosis of Prostate Cancer
results.text_hl: Subgroup analysis showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (OR=0.83, 95% CI=0.71-0.97, P=0.016) effectively reduced the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@PCA@@@.

results.title: PaSTe. Blockade of the Lipid Phenotype of Prostate Cancer as Metabolic Therapy: A Theoretical Proposal.

results.title: Overcoming statin resistance in prostate cancer cells by targeting the 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA-reductase.
results.text_hl: In our study, we treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@ cell lines (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0035 @@@PC3@@@, @CELLLINE_CVCL:4784 @@@C4-2B@@@, @CELLLINE_CVCL:0105 @@@DU-145@@@, @CELLLINE_CVCL:0395 @@@LNCaP@@@) with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@.
